privacyNotice: This program will not transfer any information to other networked systems unless specifically requested by the user.
privacyNoPersonalData: No Personal Data: TubeNotes does not collect any personally identifiable information (PII).
privacyNoTracking: No Tracking/Telemetry: We do not use any analytics, tracking pixels, or telemetry services.
privacyNoExternalServers: No External Servers: Your data is never transmitted to external servers or third-party cloud providers.
privacyLocalStorage: All your data is stored locally on your device using a SQLite database.
privacyFileAccess: The application only accesses directories necessary for its operation.
privacyUpdateChecks: Update Checks: The app may check GitHub Releases to notify you if a new version is available.
privacyExternalLinks: External Links: Clicking an external link within your notes will open in your default browser.
privacyUserControlDesc: Since all data is stored locally, you have absolute control. To delete all data, simply delete the application's local database folder in your AppData directory.
privacyContactDesc: Questions? Visit our GitHub Issues page.
importDisabled: Import is disabled after canvas modifications
